Title: Bestial Knowledge
Text: It seems the manuscripts are just a part of a larger text - the Bestiary. Furthermore, you should be able to readd the missing pages to the bestiary by studying them with the Bestiary in a Lectern. The librarian has asked you to try and complete the book, which appears to be missing 8 manuscript pages at present.
CompleteText: Oh my, it's beautiful. I'll let you hold onto it, though I won't say no to you selling me any further copies. The information in there is certainly interesting though - it almost looks like it's possible to tame dragons!
